kjv_def: avoid, eschew, go out of the way
strongs_def: to deviate, i.e. (absolutely) to shun (literally or figuratively), or (relatively) to decline (from piety)
outline:
1. to turn aside, deviate (from the right way and course)
  2. to turn (one's self) away, to turn away from, keep aloof from one's society
  3. to shun one
